title: Mental Health Clinician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at StarVista (San Mateo, CA) in Feb 2023
Interview Descriptions: Everyone was very respectful and friendly. The staff seem happy in their roles and it seems like a positive community. The pay range seems a little low but is comparative to other similar organizations.
Interview Questions: Why are you interested in this population?

title: Case Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at StarVista
Interview Descriptions: The interview was standard, and involved 2 rounds. I was asked to prepare responses to several different case scenarios. They were not too challenging and reflected the diversity and experience of the clients being served. Overall, a great learning experience.

title: Volunteer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at StarVista
Interview Descriptions: The process was very straightforward--I filled out the online application that asked for more in-depth explanations of things like our motivation for wanting to do this work. I was then connected with a coordinator by phone for a casual chat before being cleared to start the training process!
Interview Questions: Why do you want to do this work?

title: AMFT, Mental Health Clinician Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at StarVista (San Francisco, CA) in Feb 2020
Interview Descriptions: Through phone with program manager. It was a long process due to the begining of COVID. Once I began the experience to onboard was great with alot of support from staff.

title: School Based Therapist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at StarVista (San Carlos, CA) in Jan 2018
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was professional, relaxed and informative. It took an hour including questions I had at the end. Afterwards I got a tour of the office and met with the director. Interviewer was friendly, personable and professional.
Interview Questions: What are your clinical strengths for this role?

title: Case Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at StarVista in Jun 2017
Interview Descriptions: Started with a phone screen; then 1 round of in-person interviews with the program director and peer support worker. Additionally, the interviewers provided several case scenarios and asked to see how the candidate would respond to each.
Interview Questions: Tell us about your experience working with the populations we serve.

title: Mental Health Clinician Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 4 days. I interviewed at StarVista in Jun 2014
Interview Descriptions: Met with program manager first and then with PM and program director for total of two interviews in person. Basic questions, nothing unexpected. Interview process was fairly quick (within one week). Question in Spanish to test bilingual skill. Since non-profit, salary was not very negotiable, however for this field and for the case load I think it is competitive.
Interview Questions: Please describe your experience working with parents.

title: Postdoctoral Intern Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1+ week. I interviewed at StarVista (San Carlos, CA) in Feb 2012
Interview Descriptions: Correspondence was consistent and timely. Participated in two interviews, one with supervisor and additional staff person, the second was an introduction to the whole team.
